DDmod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
DDmod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

DDmod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
DDmod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
DDmod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

DDmod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
DDmod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

DDmod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
DDmod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !DDmod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

DDmod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
DDmod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !DDmod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

DDmod:UnstoppableAttack.NAME: Unstoppable
DDmod:UnstoppableAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and heal for !D!. NL Gain !B! block. NL Exhaust

DDmod:EasePowerCard.NAME: Ease
DDmod:EasePowerCard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, NL gain 1 HP.

DDmod:AllInSkill.NAME: All-In
DDmod:AllInSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain energy equal to the cost of all the cards in your hand, NL skip your next !M! turns.

DDmod:BurningFumesPowerCard.NAME: Burning Fumes
DDmod:BurningFumesPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: When a card is Exhausted, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

DDmod:PlatedThornsSkill.NAME: Plated Thorns
DDmod:PlatedThornsSkill.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Gain Thorns for every card exhausted.

DDmod:GrandUltimatumAttack.NAME: Grand Ultimatum
DDmod:GrandUltimatumAttack.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if there are no other cards in your draw pile, discard pile, and hand. NL Deal !D! to ALL enemies.

DDmod:SpikeShotSkill.NAME: Spike Shot
DDmod:SpikeShotSkill.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Thorns, NL deal that much damage !M! times to all enemies.

DDmod:RechargeSkill.NAME: Recharge
DDmod:RechargeSkill.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Skip your next turn. NL Exhaust.

DDmod:MulticlassingSkill.NAME: Multiclassing
DDmod:MulticlassingSkill.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Rare card from any class to your hand. NL It costs 0.

DDmod:PotionAddictCard.NAME: Potion Addict
DDmod:PotionAddictCard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a potion, double the effect. NL Exhaust.
